Text.Page:
The expeditionary force sent me out to hunt for them. Apparently I need to turn in my hunting credentials—I haven't bagged anything all day. I know they're getting hungry. Actually, they were hungry when I left.

You know those autumn mushrooms that grow on the Plain of the Damned? Really nutritious, and they don't taste all that bad.

I can't take them back—they'd tear me to pieces. But you, on the other hand...
You came from Craxan? You must have the meat he promised us!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Actually..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Oh. Mushrooms. Again.

You probably don't want to be here when they find out it's mushroom soup again tonight.
Where's Craxan with that blasted meat? We're hungry!
